meanings.definition: To repair or replace the sole of a shoe.
meanings.sent1: I will be resoling my favorite shoes to make them last longer.
meanings.sent2: The cobbler is resoling the worn-out shoes for the customer.
meanings.sent3: After resoling his shoes, he felt like he had a brand new pair.
meanings.sent4: She resoled her shoes with determination, just like she faced challenges in life.
meanings.sent5: The resoling process breathed new life into the old shoes.

meanings.definition: The act of repairing or replacing the sole of a shoe.
meanings.sent1: Resoling is essential to extend the life of your shoes.
meanings.sent2: The resoling of the boots was done by a skilled cobbler.
meanings.sent3: The resoling of the shoe turned out to be a costly affair.
meanings.sent4: The resoling of the shoe symbolized a fresh start for the wearer.
meanings.sent5: Proper resoling can save you money by avoiding frequent shoe replacements.
